item.description:
Procrastinators' Study Hall #1
9:30 - 11:30 AM

Have things that you should be working on? Want some help keeping on track? Hoping to meet others who are also available on a weekday morning? Well then, bring your work, a positive attitude and a resolution to get things done and let's change all that!

We'll each grab a drink and share our goals for the "study session" and then get to work. This is just a test run. If it works well and people request another one, terrific. If not, no worries. It's at least worth a shot with so many members who are self-employed, unemployed, in graduate school, in retail, etc., right?

This Panera is close to the Wellington T station, has plenty of parking and free WiFi, not to mention delicious lattes.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a wide blue Colombian coffee can in the center of our table.
item.name: Non-alcoholic Happy Hour ; )
